Package controller

Class LivesController

java.lang.Object
controller.LivesController
public class LivesController
extends java.lang.Object
New class that creates a static instance of LivesView to generate images representing lives of frog.

Allows us to implement setter and getter methods for froglives. Allows us to implement a method to remove froglives.

Author:
hcysu1
